name: Michael Hudson
text:
It’s a hit or miss with Pizza Hut, I can have 5 good experiences, correct order, fast delivery, perfectly cooked to order,
Then have a bad experience because I changed or asked to have a topping removed. …More

name: Davion Vang
text: This place is my preferred one. I go to plenty of restaurants but to this place I keep coming back again and again. The team is very friendly and the cooking they cook is so fresh and tasty. I am always happy to have a decent meal here. Highly recommended.

name: Nick James
text: Employers are absolutely lazy, they are always sitting down in the back and have no respect for the customers and they cuss way too much, one of the managers who was at the register was not nice to me at all and had given me attitude when i asked a few questions about deals there. Absolutely terrible

name: Matt Jager
text: Their crust is cardboard thin. Their other toppings are okay but not worth it. Over priced and honestly pretty terrible.

name: S Winter
text: It's been years since I had pizza Hut and remember why. Crust is nothing great and the toppings on a supreme were sparce. When I arrived everyone was in the back making and boxing pizza, I yelled for help twice and no one came.  It wasn't …More

name: heidi Rawley
text: This was terrible.  We had delivery.  First they forgot to deliver our wings then our pizzas were all cold.  They told me they would remake our wings and deliver them but 1 hour later when they were delivered  they were so cold.  We will never go there again

name: M S
text: I'm running at a one because their food has gone downhill their prices are too high for what they give you and I was treated with disrespect when I was there.All I asked for was some red pepper flakes and they were going to charge me a …More

name: Sunny Klobchar
text: Went in and placed an order it was done in about 10 minutes, great customer service and of course the pizza was great!

name: Tasha Pianezzola
text: Ordered around 7pm on a Monday. 30 minutes from order to delivery. Pizza was hot and to specification. Driver was very polite. Great experience!

name: Jacob Knight
text: I agree with 0 stars, I’ve called to order at this location once or twice a month for a couple years now but I’m done forever!!!! Every time I call they are out of whatever I’m trying to order, I mean every time. What kind of pizza …More

name: Christian Arriaga
text: Great cookie and pizza

name: Raj S.
text: Fast and friendly service. My Pizza was ready for carryout on time. Very convenient location and ample parking.

name: Mithun Mhatre
text: Bad...it was just bread. I ordered extra BBQ sauce and extra chicken. Pineapple and jalapeños. It was just pizza base. Bad experience. Won’t order from that location again.

name: Alena Gonzalez
text: We order gluten free pizzas for our employees every other week. 90% of the time it's both late AND burned. Today they delivered two separate orders to one address and then hung up on me when I called about the mistake. When I called back, …More

name: Aaron Cartwright
text: I love this place so much this is the best Pizza Hut in the valley I haven't been to a Pizza Hut that is treated me so well their pizza was fast and efficient and so hot I had to wait for it to cool down I have recently also has a delivery …More

name: Cris Balmanno
text: Pizza arrived hot, and we didn't starve, but that's the best thing I could say.  Everything was overcooked to the point of being almost burned, cheese was gritty like sand, crust was flavorless and soggy. The pizza that was supposed to have …More

name: samantha warren
text: Not very happy with the speed of service. Says it would take 30-40 minutes. I get a call 40 minutes after I order from the delivery driver saying hes on his way. After waiting another 35 minutes he shows up with my burnt pizza.

name: Hannah Brown
text: Food was good like always, but when I went in the get my food the whole place smelled like cigarette smoke because one of the employees was smoking by the back door with it open. Very unprofessional.

name: XTC Trader
text: Ordered online and pizza & wings were ready when I arrived 15 minutes later. Only gave 4 stars since the pizza didn't taste as good as I've had in the past and the wings are too small for the price they charge.

name: Jason Nguyen
text: Trash pizza, undercooked and soggy pizza and we waited 20 mins more than expected, only good thing is the pasta. Won't be returning.

name: RZA YAGHI
text:
*****ZERO STARS*****
Horrible!!!!!!! I ordered my food at 920 and  the website  said it will be delivered  by 1015. They charged my card but never delivered and also closed shopped at 10. Lol I will never do business with them again!!!! #dominoswin

name: Bridget S
text: This place sucks. I've had them call twice to tell me that they don't have a driver for deliveries & either cancel or wait for an hour or 2. The food itself isn't anything to shake a stick at, they've gotten my order wrong twice.

name: Chris Wright
text: Great pizza they're always extremely fast and make great suggestions if you're looking for something different to!

name: Corby B.
text: Good pizza, good deals. Today's was a little over cooked.

name: colby jones
text: Never order here.  Call and ask for a manager.  surprise you will be placed on hold for over 20 min. we didn't get our dipping marinara for the cold bread sticks. no big deal ill call and she can turn around seeing she just drove off. …More

name: Hive 360
text: On time!

name: Rebeca Hernandez
text: The pizza time was awful and when we finally got it the pizzas they were greasy and the ingredients were not the best. I am sad about our latest experiences since I am such a fan of stuff crust and Pizza Hut. I hadn't been disappointed at other locations but after 3 chances, our family decided to never order from this location again.

name: Cole Smith
text: My first mistake was calling in my order, after their website would not work. The young female on the phone was laughing with someone in the background, all the while barely asking for my order. …More

name: Abby Taylor
text: We consistently are getting our pizza here, they seem to miss a few things every so often, like garlic and ranch that we spend an extra 3 or 4 dollars on. Or the free buffalo drizzle. But last night we ordered and it was spot on, was a …More

name: RENZO LANDA
text: management sucks horrible experience! drivers are awesome.

name: Meg Lynn
text: Twice now as of today i have ordered food and left specific driver instructions to knock softly, and NOT ring the doorbell, because i have two napping toddlers in the other room, and its very loud and will wake them up. I am quite upset …More

name: Jonathan Williams
text: Good Pizza Hut location with typical service that you'd expect. I've never had a bad experience. You just get what you'd expect.

name: Sam Coleman
text: I have 3 pizza huts all about the same distance from my house and this is the best one for toppings, quality and customer service - unfortunately I was reminded of this last week when I chose the store in Herriman and got little toppings and tasteless pizza.

name: Bill Millet
text: I have ordered pizza several times - the delivery person is always friendly and helpful.  Pizza is wonderful.  I will keep ordering.

name: Joni Baxter
text: Pizza is okay. They have reasonable prices. But I wouldn't go there if it weren't next door to my mother-in-law.

name: Kristy Anderson
text: We ordered pizza and wings. They forgot the wings and it took over an hour to deliver them. The pizza has changed and not as good as it used to be. I will probably never go there again .

name: Catherine Depola
text: I had a delivery. The wait wasn't very long but the pizza was very disappointing. I ordered one pepperoni and one pepperoni and mushroom. Hardly any pepperoni and maybe 8 pieces of mushroom on a large pizza. Most slices didn't even have not …More

name: Katy Savage
text: Pizza hut's gluten free pizza is more expensive, smaller, and not as tasteful as California Pizza Kitchen Restaurant, Papa Murphy's Take-and-Bake, and almost every gf frozen pizza you can buy. Go to the store and buy Against the Grain brand, it is AMAZING!! and grain free.

name: Janet Palepoi
text: If I can give -1 star I would. Worst place ever. I ordered online today from this location and I'm a regular customer. Pick up was set for 430pm. I went to the location and the doors were locked.  I called to find out why the doors were …More

text: I should have heeded the previous reviews. Don't go here.The  Associate told the customer ahead of me that she couldn't get something because they were out. After I placed my order the associate told ME that I couldn't get the entire order …More

text: I am so disappointed with this store. I have tried 4 times over the last month to order from this specific location and it almost seems as if they do not want my business. One time they are out of dough, another they have two people working …More

text: This is the second time I got the wrong pizza after waiting for two hours to get it in the first place. It is dry and looks and tasted like it had been under the heat lamp for the two hours.
